data.title: More fix to compile libjscocos2dx as dll under win32
cocos run -p android fails with dlopen failed: cannot locate symbol "atof" referenced by "libcocos2djs.so"
Rotation3D not working if Sprite3D has a Physics3DComponent or if using PhysicsSprite3D
Windows Phone 8.1: Seperate Characters in RTL Label
data.body:
Hi 
I use below code to show a text :
`auto label = Label::createWithSystemFont("سلام و خداحافظ", "BTitrBold", 24);`
( RTL text like Persian, Arabic and Hebrew)
This code works fine in both `**Android**` and `**iOS**`. But when I run project on `**WindowsPhone8.1-universal**` device, the label shows the characters not only **separated** but also **LTR** , as below screenshot:
![winphone](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2047884/13724436/c1fc3164-e89a-11e5-9b44-3670c536bbb5.jpg)

I was faced same problem in Android long time ago. But It solved [Link](http://discuss.cocos2d-x.org/t/right-to-left-text-direction-in-cocos2dx/19784).

In order to solving problem I compiled [**fribidi**](https://github.com/behdad/fribidi/) library for windowsPhone. this library solve separated character problems (somehow) but still Wrapping is a big problem.

Please solve Right-To-Left problem in WindowPhone8.1. We really miss this platform's store.

PS: cocos2dx 3.10

data.title: Fix calculation of base64Encode outLength
data.body:
The order of integer arithmetic is important, the original code fail to
calculate the length correctly, e.g. inLength 20 for base64Encode should
output 28, not 30. It is fixed and simplified with this commit.

data.title: cocosstudio一个场景中，多个相同节点，使用不同的嵌套动画，无法完全播放
data.body:
如题，我在cocosstudio中，创建了多个相同的node节点，绑定了相同的csd文件，但是在动画中嵌套播放了不同的嵌套动画（NoLoopAction）

播放出现了问题

data.title: Fix base64 buffer length calculation
data.body: Especially outLength of base64Encode.

data.title: v3.11 Windows 10 UWP fixes
data.body:
This pull request updates the Windows 10 UWP project files to support cocos2d-x v3.11. This pull request depends upon the updated chipmunk libs in the pull request https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x-3rd-party-libs-bin/pull/206

This PR does the following:

Adds missing files to the Windows 10 UWP projects
Updates the chipmunk include path
Updates the Windows 10 app framework to pass WACK testing
external/config.json is updated to v3-deps-84.

data.title: v3.11 Windows 10 UWP fixes
data.body:
This pull request updates the chipmunk libs for Windows 10 UWP and Windows 8.1 Universal to v7.0.1.

These libs were generated using the scripts in the pull request:

https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x-3rd-party-libs-src/pull/98

@zilongshanren @pandamicro Please review this PR.

data.title: Error when having a class named Game in Win32
data.body:
I have a class named `Game`in my project. It has worked on all platforms but now added a win32 project which throws the error: "Game is ambiguous".

It seems to be caused by the line 162 `friend class Game;` in [CCProperties.h](https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/blob/v3/cocos/base/CCProperties.h#L162) which, as far as I can tell, doesn't do anything at all. I've commented this line and now it works.

Should this line be removed from cocos2d-x or am I failing to see something?

data.title: help for add cocos2dx framework source to vs2015 project
data.body:
I'm new to c++.

I need change some of the cocos's code, so I want to rebuilt win32 sln in my vs2015 on windows 2008 server, however I built coco's sln successfully after my code updated,

but when I run my project, there is a lot of problem,

so I want to include cocos2dx source code to my project, what should I do?

I've tried add libcocos2d libSpine libbox2d and other 2 proejects that the libcocos2d refered, but the problem is same.
